com.google.appinventor.client

Class Registry<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.client.Registry<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - class of the keys
    V - class of the values
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectEditorRegistry

    public class Registry<K,V>
extends Object
    A global configuration database of per-class properties. Configuration settings apply to (objects of) a class and all of its subclasses, as long as they are not overridden for a more specific subclass.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Registry(Class<K> rootClass)
      Creates a new registry.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      V get(Class<? extends K> key)
      Returns the configured value for a given class.

      Convenience method that returns the configuration of an object's class.
      protected void register(Class<? extends K> key, V value)
      Adds a new configuration setting to the registry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Registry

        protected Registry(Class<K> rootClass)
        Creates a new registry.
        Parameters:
        rootClass - root class of the keys

    • Method Detail

      • register

        protected void register(Class<? extends K> key,
            V value)
        Adds a new configuration setting to the registry. The value applies to the given class and all subclasses, as long as there is no more specific configuration.
        Parameters:
        key - the class for which to add configuration
        value - the configuration value

      • get

        public V get(Class<? extends K> key)
        Returns the configured value for a given class. If no value has been configured for the given class, the configuration of its super-class (or super-super-class, an so on) will be returned.
        Parameters:
        key - the class for which to retrieve the configured value
        Returns:
        the configured value or null if none is found

      • get

        public V get(K key)
        Convenience method that returns the configuration of an object's class.
        Parameters:
        key - the object for whose class to determine the configuration
        Returns:
        the object class's configuration
        See Also:
        get(Class)
